title: Hook Main Club [OCE]
body: I am currently the owner of a club with the tag "HÃ¸ok", as you would imagine this club is exclusive to only {{champion:412}}, {{champion:53}}, {{champion:111}} and {{champion:555}}  mains. If you're interested in joining my name is: ElectricTiger60. The champs I have just mentioned must be in top 3.

replies.body: Those are good suggestions, but I wanted to mainly focus on supports or people who could go into the support role. I probably should have mentioned that earlier, that was my bad.

Sign me up!!! HAHAHAHA

Lvl 7 on Thresh, Blitz, Leona, Noc, Braum :D I guess ill have to lvl 7 Pyke now haha
Lvl 6 Naut, so hard to get 7 to him :(
I wasn't the one who made the club or the club tag but I ended up being the owner of both. I had no control over the club tag...

I saw your friend request for the few minutes I was online but I wasn't able to accept. I will warn you though, the club is well and truly dead and not very active anymore. If you still want to join then I'm more than willing to accept you into the club.
How does Lux fit in with the champions I have mentioned before?
